Package org.springframework.web.socket

Common abstractions and Spring configuration support for WebSocket applications.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    WebSocketHandler
    A handler for WebSocket messages and lifecycle events.
    WebSocketSession
    A WebSocket session abstraction.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinaryMessage
    A WebSocketMessage that contains a binary ByteBuffer payload.
    CloseStatus
    Represents a WebSocket close status code and reason.
    TextMessage
    A WebSocketMessage that contains a textual String payload.
    WebSocketMessage<T>
    A message that can be handled or sent on a WebSocket connection.

Package org.springframework.web.socket Description

Common abstractions and Spring configuration support for WebSocket applications.
